name: Taisen Mahjong HaoPai
description: Taisen Mahjong HaoPai is a traditional tile-based game of Mahjong that allows the player to take the role of one out of six characters. The game starts off with rolling twin dice then the player must play against the CPU or a another player and try to accumulate the minimum score needed to win.
gamePlay: Board game, Cards / tiles, Turn-based strategy
